text: Etu nimite, kun manu niyom laga kaam te he bharosa kori kene thake taikhan paap te giri ase; aru etu karone eneka likhi kene ase, “Kun manu etu niyom laga kitab te likhi kene thaka khan namani kene thake, taikhan paap te giri kene ase, aru kun etu nakore taikhan bhi paap te ase3.10 Deu. 27:26; Jam. 2:20, 12.”
